name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I deliver high-performance solutions leveraging modern technologies. Proficient in **Java**, **SpringMVC**, and **Springboot**, I specialize in developing robust applications tailored to diverse business needs. My experience extends to cloud services including **AWS** (SNS, S3, RDS, ECS, EKS, Lambda) and I am skilled in **SQL** for database management. I also bring expertise in **ApacheKafka**, **CloudFormation**, and CI/CD processes to streamline development workflows. My background incorporates designing enterprise-grade systems with a strong focus on microservices architecture and API development, making me adaptable across various sectors including e-commerce and healthcare.
